name: Monday.com
title: A visual cheat-sheet for the 24 keyboard shortcuts found on Monday.com

cards.title: Intro
cards.body: A visual cheat-sheet for the 24 keyboard shortcuts found on Monday.com

cards.title: System
cards.body:
| Shortcut   | Action                                    |
| ---------- | ----------------------------------------- |
| `Ctrl` `B` | Bolt Switch (quick switch between boards) |
| `Esc`      | Close Item Page                           |
| `Esc`      | Close Dialogs                             |
| `Esc`      | Close Search                              |

cards.title: Board I
cards.body:
| Shortcut      | Action                   |
| ------------- | ------------------------ |
| `Down`        | Navigate Down            |
| `Up`          | Navigate Up              |
| `Left`        | Navigate Left            |
| `Right`       | Navigate Right           |
| `Tab`         | Navigate to Next Cell    |
| `Shift` `Tab` | Navigate to Previous Tab |
| `Enter`       | Edit Cell Content        |
| `Backspace`   | Clear Cell Content       |
| `Space`       | Open Column View         |

cards.title: Board II
cards.body:
| Shortcut           | Action                     |
| ------------------ | -------------------------- |
| `Ctrl` `F`         | Search Board               |
| `Ctrl` `C`         | Copy Cell Content          |
| `Ctrl` `V`         | Paste Cell Content         |
| `Ctrl` `X`         | Cut Cell Content           |
| `Ctrl` `Enter`     | Select Item                |
| `Shift` `Enter`    | Select Range of Items      |
| `Ctrl` `Shift` `G` | Create New Group           |
| `Ctrl` `Shift` `C` | Create New Column          |
| `Ctrl` `L`         | Open Activity Log          |
| `Ctrl` `(click)`   | Sort Another Column        |
| `Ctrl` `G`         | Collapse/Expand All Groups |
